answers.answer: Hello,the issue for persons with diabetes is that high blood sugars make the risk of infection and poor healing very much higher.However, if your blood sugar is very well controlled you may be a candidate still.  You would need to see the doctor for whether they would consider you.

question: I’m 50 and diabetic. Take in medicines to control my sugar level. Recently I had a friend who went for a plastic surgery procedure of Liposuction at Oakland( www.josephtogbamd.com ) . Her results were quite positive, which makes me take an interest for a lipo too. I wanted to know if this is okay with a diabetic person like me?! My friend suggested that I consult her surgeon  Dr. Joseph Togba for at least once before I decide, following which I’ve scheduled an appointment with this doc.
title: Diabetes and Liposuction
